# iru_device_activity (Data Source)

List activity for a device.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iru_device_activity" "example" {
  device_id = "your-device-uuid"
  limit     = 20
}

output "device_activity" {
  value = data.iru_device_activity.example.activity
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `device_id` (String) The unique identifier for the Device.

### Optional

- `limit` (Number) Limit results (max 300).

### Read-Only

- `activity` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--activity))

<a id="nestedatt--activity"></a>
### Nested Schema for `activity`

Read-Only:

- `action_type` (String)
- `blueprint_routing` (Boolean)
- `created_at` (String)
- `id` (Number)
